bill_title: make an appropriation to the Board of Regents to support the research, education, and economic development network.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation to the Board of Regents to support the research, education, and economic development network. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of six hundred four thousand six hundred seventeen dollars ($ 604,617 ), or so much thereof as may be necessary, and 5.0 FTEs to the Board of Regents to support the research, education, and economic development network. Section 2. The Board of Regents may expend up to one hundred sixty-eight thousand two hundred seventy-six dollars of the moneys appropriated by this Act to pay for increased maintenance costs incurred on firewalls and on the intrusion detection system. Section 3. The Board of Regents may expend up to four hundred thirty-six thousand three hundred forty-one dollars of the moneys appropriated by this Act to fill one full-time network director position and four full-time research technician positions, and to fund operating expenses associated with the five full-time equivalent positions authorized by this Act.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
